title: Bradley Cooper twins with his daughter Lea De Seine, two, as they suit up for a black tie event
text:
Besides a red carpet, he's usually seen keeping things casual when out with his daughter Lea De Seine Shayk Cooper, two.

But things were a little different for Bradley Cooper on Sunday, as he was seen suiting up for a black tie event with his little girl.

The 44-year-old actor appeared in high spirits as he held Lea's hand while they crossed the road in twinning outfits.

Scroll down for video

Like father, like daughter: Bradley Cooper was seen twinning with his daughter, Lea De Seine, two, during an outing on Sunday when they both dressed up for a black tie event around New York City

Bradley rocked a white button-up shirt underneath a slim fitting suit jacket.

He teamed the look with perfectly hemmed trousers and a pair of lace-up shoes.

The doting father carried a backpack along with him and rocked a cap on his head backwards.

Dapper: Bradley rocked a white button-up shirt underneath a slim fitting suit jacket

Daddy's little girl: Little Lea appeared to be no trouble at all for her dad, wearing a sweet black little dress underneath a puffer vest for extra warmth

Bradley accessorized with a pair of shades and walked along with a smile on his face.

Little Lea appeared to be no trouble at all for her dad, wearing a sweet black little dress underneath a puffer vest for extra warmth.

She was also dressed in white stockings and a pair of black sneakers for the special outing around New York City.

Not seen with the pair was Bradley's ex and Lea's mom, Russian supermodel, Irina Shayk.

Living separate lives: Not seen with the pair was Bradley's ex and Lea's mom, Russian supermodel, Irina Shayk (pictured 2018)

Over: The pair called it quits back in June after four years together (pictured October 2018)

The pair called it quits back in June after four years together.

A source close to the couple told People at the time: 'Bradley was emotionally absent during the long time filming A Star Is Born. They tried to save the relationship but it had changed.'

There were rumors at the time that he and co-star Lady Gaga had a romance blossoming in real life, following their intimate performance of Grammy and Oscar winning song, Shallow, at the Academy Awards.

Rumors resurfaced once again in recent times when Life & Style reported that the singer thought Bradley was 'the one.'

'There’s no doubt about it — Lady Gaga fell head over heels for Bradley during filming and promotion of A Star Is Born,' they said.

'She’s telling her friends he broke her heart. Gaga feels like Bradley led her on because he was giving off all the signs that they’d become an item once he was single.'
description: Bradley Cooper was seen twinning with his daughter, Lea De Seine, two, during an outing on Sunday when they both dressed up for a black tie event around New York City.
